response.explain: The previous action code successfully executed the subtask of taking the peach out of the fridge. The peach is now in the robot's inventory. The next step is to close the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge
(2) Open the fridge
(3) Take the peach out of the fridge
(4) Close the fridge
(5) Open the bottom cabinet
(6) Take a jar out of the bottom cabinet
(7) Close the bottom cabinet
(8) Put the peach inside the jar
(9) Close the jar
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 4: Close the fridge
    fridge = registry(env, "fridge_xyejdx_0")
    close(robot, fridge)
    donothing(env)
